title: Can't load the game screen after champion selection
body:
patch 7.1, after champion selection my screen just turning black and exit to desktop. I can still hear the game sound. Made my team lost the game and got reported :(. Yesterday was fine
Can someone help me?
Thanks
PS My computer can still run other games and no recent update.

replies.body: If you're able to hear sound but can't see the screen then it sounds like you were able to connect but something  like hardware failed to render the screen.  To start out, try the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if that does the trick!
Thanks for help,I upgraded my graphic driver.

if you want to play ths game on full screen you need new monitor.
 Game don't support 60 hertz monitors on full screen on this new patch
But you can play on  WindowMode.
